title: A Global Statistician’s Love for Lily Seeds Turns Entrepreneurial!
author: Devanshi Rathi
excerpt: For Mallika Chawla, entrepreneurship was not something that came by nature. She was a trained economist and statistician obtaining her master’s degree from the University of Cambridge, which she followed up by working in a high-profiled role at Goldman Sachs in Singapore.
